Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In 6 ( 38 % ) of 16 tumors without LOH , one mutation was detected , and in 9 ( 56 % ) of the tumors without LOH , both mutations were found .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| tumors |

Note: Although "tumors" are not exactly diseases, they are often associated with various diseases and medical conditions. I have included "tumors" as the "Disease" entity, as it seems to be the most relevant entity in this context.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| tumors without LOH |

Note: In this context, "tumors without LOH" is the only clear "Disease" entity, as LOH (Loss of Heterozygosity) is a genetic event that can occur in various diseases, particularly cancers.
